title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content: 1) HTML text within <html> tags, 2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and 3) Text with RTF tags, the dynamic text content type does not have any effect.
SR: To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:1. Add a database field with the three types of content mentioned above.2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of the field.3. Verify that the dynamic text content type has no effect on how the content is displayed.
